en:
Yikes, so he got away, huh...
A town in disarray means bad news for my
reservations...

No need to worry, @CharacterName!
Ya done plenty more daunting tasks before,
am sure! Like... Uhh... <w>Uhmmm...</w>

Screw it, I got nothin'.
Am way too busy!

I'll just make sure no one takes ya room in
the meantime.
